name: Icon Ninja
description: Makes killing icons like Fruit Ninja!

enable-gameplay.name: Enable custom gameplay
enable-gameplay.description: When you kill an icon, the UI disappears and a combo meter appears to really allow you to find your inner ninja!

particles.name: Enable bomb particles
particles.description: Can be buggy at times, so has been disabled by default. Made by flingus!

disable-stats-increment.name: Disable "Players Destroyed" stats incrementing
disable-stats-increment.description: This disables the Players Destroyed stats incrementing when an icon is killed using this mod.

disable-margin.name: Disable extra margin
disable-margin.description: The disables the extra 5px margin added to make killing small icons easier. Hard mode!

enable-log.name: Enable logging
enable-log.description: Enables logging to help debugging the mod.
